titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 9) to direct the President to develop a plan for the United States to meet its nationally determined contribution under the Paris Agreement, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 9) to direct the President to develop a plan for the United States to meet its nationally determined contribution under the Paris Agreement, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-42, by Mr. McGovern.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 9 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Motion to recommit with or without instructions allowed. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 21.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 329.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 191 (Roll no. 172).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 188 (Roll no. 173).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 9) to direct the President to develop a plan for the United States to meet its nationally determined contribution under the Paris Agreement.
